faqs.question: Which catering services can MAFA deploy on remote sites?
faqs.answer: MAFA delivers end-to-end catering for mining camps, hospitals, schools, and events, covering menu engineering, supply chain, and QHSE controls.

faqs.question: How does MAFA guarantee food safety and hygiene?
faqs.answer: We apply certified QHSE procedures with traceability, daily inspections, and continuous training for all operational teams.

faqs.question: Can MAFA manage hotel logistics for a multi-site network?
faqs.answer: Yes. We supervise sourcing, delivery, maintenance, and inventory for hotel and kitchen equipment across national or regional networks.

faqs.question: Do you offer certified culinary training programs?
faqs.answer: MAFA runs certified curricula combining theory, practice in training kitchens, QHSE audits, and placement within our hospitality network.

faqs.question: How does MAFA support agro-food transformation?
faqs.answer: We set up and operate processing units to convert local crops into value-added food products with quality control and secured outlets.

faqs.question: Do you provide strategic consulting or maintenance services?
faqs.answer: MAFA offers strategic advisory, preventive maintenance, and partnership facilitation to build resilient support services across Africa.
